title: VDM Run Manifest v1
description: Canonical manifest emitted in GUI mode or when VDM_NEXUS=1. References the experiment schema/spec used for KPI thresholds; GUI is read-only and validates against this schema.

repo_commit.description: Short or full git commit hash of the repo at run time

experiment_schema.description: Path (repo-relative) to the JSON Schema used by this run's spec

spec_path.description: Path (repo-relative) to the spec JSON used for this run

fields.description: Published datasets available for viewport and analysis

kind.description: Data kind: scalar field, vector field, tensor field, point set (particles), or mesh

cells.description: For unstructured meshes (e.g., tet, hex, tri)

attribs.description: Attribute names carried by this dataset (e.g., ['x','v','mass'])

kpis.description: Optional per-step KPI summary values emitted by the runner (read-only for GUI)

provenance.description: Optional file integrity block recorded by the publisher

sha256.description: SHA-256 hash over the manifest or associated artifact list

sizes.description: Map from artifact relative path to byte size
